title: Homemade Chicken Pot Pie Recipe
content:
This is a delicious chicken pot pie that tastes amazing for either a light lunch or dinner. This is so much easier and simple to make at home and kids will love it.

 

Chicken Pot Pie Recipe - Homemade Chicken Pie From Scratch

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 1 hour

Total time: 1 hour 10 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Greece

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

 

FOR PASTRY:

All-Purpose Flour / Maida - 1 cup

Cold Butter - 50 grams cubed

Salt to taste

Cold Water as needed

 

FOR CHICKEN:

Butter - 1 tablespoon

Oil - 1 tablespoon

Boneless Chicken - 500 grams

Dried Rosemary - 1 teaspoon

Cayenne Powder - 1 teaspoon

Salt to taste

All-Purpose Flour / Maida - 2 tablespoon

 

FOR FILLING:

Butter - 2 tablespoon

Garlic - 1 tablespoon minced

Onion - 1 chopped finely

Carrot - 1 chopped finely

Bell Pepper - 1 chopped finely

Salt to taste

Black Pepper to taste

All-Purpose Flour / Maida - 2 tablespoon

Milk - 2 cups

Frozen Peas - ½ cup

Chopped Parsley or Coriander - 2 tablespoon

 

Instructions

Make pastry dough. Take flour in a bowl. Add salt and mix well.

Add in butter and rub it into the flour. Add cold water and shape it into a dough. Chill in the fridge for 1 hour.

Mix chicken with rosemary, salt, all-purpose flour, and cayenne.

Heat oil and butter in a pan, fry chicken till golden brown. Remove and set aside.

Heat more butter in the same pan, add garlic, onion, carrot, and peppers. Saute for a min.

Add in flour, salt, pepper and mix well.

Add milk and mix well.

Add in chicken and frozen peas and simmer for 10 to 15 mins.

Add chopped parsley and mix well.

Now cool this mix. Preheat oven to 200 degrees C.

Take a portion of the dough and roll it into a sheet.

Spoon it into individual pan and top with the rolled pastry sheet,'Make holes in the top. seal the edges.

Pop it in the oven and bake for 25 to 30 mins till golden.

Remove and serve it.

recommendations.title: Tasty Baked Chicken Cream Cheese Dip Recipe
recommendations.content:
Delicious chicken cream cheese dip which tastes amazing for parties or get-togethers. This is not only easy to make but taste amazing.
This is a great party recipe. You can make a big batch of it and enjoy it as a dip for parties.

recommendations.title: Tasty Sesame Chicken Noodles Recipe
recommendations.content:
Delicious chicken noodles made with a touch of sesame flavor. It tastes so delicious and is so fast to make as well.
 
Sesame Chicken Noodles Recipe
Prep time: 10 mins
Cook time: 30 mins
Total time: 40 mins

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
